remarks: Exchange a substitution with 4 existentials.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Oct-2014.)  Obsolete as of 24-Aug-2018.  Use ~ csbov123 instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
